item.title: Thinking Exercises
item.description: Imagine You’re An Alien If I were an alien, I might find Earth’s reliance on the sun to be strange: There are other ways to use energy, yet everything on the Earth relies on the sun. All food chains on Earth start with the sun, so all living life is reliant on the big ball of gas in the sky. Humans have not figured out how to transfer energy without losing energy.
